main.name: Juan Carlos Gonzalez
main.description: I design and program websites and web applications with a specialization on the MERN Stack
main.bio: Web developer in training seeking for an opportunity to seriously enter the field of web development and gaining professional working experience. Will be graduating from UNCC Full-Stack Web Development Coding Bootcamp in August 2017. I've been practicing and studying Aikido for 11 years.

education.description: Six month long training to obtain a Full-Stack Web Development Certificate from the University of North Carolina Charlotte with a specialization on the MERN Stack.
Well rounded education in Liberal Arts.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer in Training
description: • Six months of intensive training in a curriculum that covers the skills necessary to become an able front and/or back-end developer. Graduation is in August 2017.

work.title: Delivery Driver
description: • Take phone calls, take orders and provide customers with information on how long their order delivery will take.
• Bag ordered items, map route on the GPS or look through map to determine shortest and safest route to destination(s).
• Receive cash payments and tender exact change, or collect customer’s signature on credit card receipt.

work.title: Janitor
description: • Serviced and cleaned restrooms; gathered and emptied the trash from multiple work areas; dusted furniture, desks, and countertops; monitored building security and safety by performing such tasks as locking doors after operating hours and setting up of alarm security system.
• Cleaned building floors by sweeping, mopping and vacuuming; cleaned windows with proper equipment (paper, dry rags) using appropriate chemical solutions.
• Ordered supplies needed for cleaning and maintenance duty.

work.title: Shift Supervisor
description: • Raised and maintained customer service and store cleanliness standards.
• Implemented a systematic routine known as “Playbook” designed to keep store at peak performance at all times.
• Organized staff breaks while ensuring adequate coverage at all times.

projects.title: FizzBuzz
projects.description: My personal attempt at the FizzBuzz challenge with code solution and output provided.
